name: 施青良
objective: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
schedule:
關於各週課程細節與公告，請參考http://sites.google.com/site/ntutshih/home/sr_6
1		course introduction
2		AEF 1A: Who’s who?
3		AEF 1B: Who knows you better?
4		AEF 1C: At the Moulin Rouge
5		AEF 1D: The Devil’s Dictionary
6		AEF 1 Review: At the airport
7		AEF 2A: Right place, wrong time
8		AEF 2B: A moment in time
9		AEF 2C: Fifty year of pop music
10		AEF 2D: One October evening
11		AEF 2 Review: In the hotel
12		AEF 3A: Where are you going
13		AEF 3B: The pessimist’s phrase book
14		AEF 3C: I’ll always love you
15		AEF 3D: I was only dreaming
16		AEF 3 Review: Restaurant problems
17		Final Test
scorePolicy:
(1) 全校英文會考 30%
(2) 期末小考 15%　（於一月六日舉行）　
(3) 課堂練習 55%
materials:
1) American English File 2A
2) Selections from Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
3) Audio-visual materials
